remove-backup-older-than.description: Remove all the backups in PBS that are older than specified value. It should be rdiff-backup-compatible.

ignore-known-hosts-file.title: Ignore known_hosts file
ignore-known-hosts-file.description: Set either to fill known_hosts file for ssh or not. Useful if main instance and PBS are using the same IP (slapos proxy, webrunner).
